授業目的: The main purpose of this course is to enable students to familiarize authentic literary texts in English. Currently many young people often enjoy English literature as a form of visual contents, such as movies and videos, but only few people read the written originals. This course will provide you with a lot of opportunities to read several stories for young readers created by Roald Dahl. Secondly, the course is providing you opportunities to consider the benefits of reading authentic materials for English learners. You will create activities by adapting the stories they have read in the course.
到達目標:
1. You will be able to know Roald Dahl's work written for young readers.
2. You will practice sustained reading of a selection of Dahl's stories.
3. You will be able to consider the benefits of reading authentic materials for English learners.
4. You will be able to create teaching materials by adapting the texts they have read and presented them to the course participants.
授業方法:
- When the course has to go online, it will be done via zoom sessions that you need to participate every week.
- Pair and group activities will be frequently used throughout the semester.
